dc.title: Coordinating Council on Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention
dc.description: The Council's primary functions are to coordinate all Federal juvenile delinquency prevention programs, all Federal programs and activities that detain or care for unaccompanied juveniles, and all Federal programs relating to missing and exploited children.
